formalpara.title: Figure 14. Rho GTPases in attractive axon guidance and neuronal protrusion.
formalpara.para: CED-10 and MIG-2 act redundantly downstream of CDC-42 and the guidance receptor UNC-40/DCC in attractive axon guidance and neuronal protrusion. The Arp2/3 activator complex acts in both pathways, with WSP-1/WASP acting in the MIG-2 pathway and WVE-1/WAVE acting in the CED-10 pathway. The GEF TIAM-1 regulates CED-10 and MIG-2 in attractive axon guidance and neuronal protrusion.
